name: What do we want from a web browser? with Nick Nisi from JS Party (Changelog & Friends #14)
summary: A hoy hoy! Our old friend Nick Nisi does his best to bring up TypeScript, Vim &amp; Tmux as many times as possible while we discuss a new batch of web browsers, justify why we like the ones we do &amp; try to figure out what itâ€™d take to disrupt the status quo of Big Browser.
